item.title: Best Albums of 2022
item.description: 2022 was a good year for music. Here are a few of my favorite albums that I discovered and obsessed over. Arguably data driven since I used my Last.fm stats (Disclamer: I’m not a critic and this list is probably extremely biased. It might also contain albums that were not released in 2022, but welp) Is This It: The Strokes (2001) Julian’s voice over the classic rock themes of the early 2000’s was my soundtrack of the year.
